Text:
can you  get Beachcomber's Windowsill by Stornoway please, looking all over for it!! 

keep up the brill work

hey Bubs

have you ever had a band personally contact you for posting their album?

i created a small site for my "followers" which is kind of getting somewhere good and a "member" of a band registered and practically demanded i take their album down.

just wondering what your thoughts are on this seeing as you are the audio god here on TPB.

Hey Z.. no never have been approached at all.. but if they would like to throw me some notes.. yeah!!!

besides that.. are they a known group these people and whats stopping them really posting it themselves? 2 things come to mind on this.. either there fans of your uploads or their peeps who work for someone like record/movie company reps!!!!! i would look into it first full stop.. hope that helps a bit buddy, bubs..

they aren't well known at all.  they are a garbage metal/hardcore band.

i posted their new album and a member of the band was just complaining about me putting their album on here.  he said, and i quote "JonnyBeans has basically raped the internet with our new album" and he went on to ask if i would take it down.

i thought it was pretty outrageous and weird.  boosts my ego i guess.  i told him his bands album hardly got any attention after i posted it and once they make a good album then he can bitch about me posting it here for free.
hey bubanee do you know how much we have to do to get a pink skull??? or  any skull

when i got my first skull i just logged on oneday and a mod left a message saying 'Enjoy your skull'

there is a section in the forum i saw once where you can ask if i remember rightly.. try there.. :))

http://suprbay.org/

if i would have listened to this and not know who it was, i would have never guessed it to be tom petty and the hearbreakers...sounds a lot different than what im used to hearing from them...although what i hear isnt bad

bubanee, I have probably downloaded about half of your uploads over the past couple years here on The Pirate Bay. I would just like to say thank you for the quality, the tunes, and the internet hospitality. 

Cheers.
